manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The 104-Pro GPS Tracker will be shipped to your address and ready to use immediately. Once turned on, it will automatically start uploading its position and speed, along with many other useful parameters, to our tracking software GPSLive for you to view them in real time using a PC, Tablet or Smartphone. The 104-Pro GPS tracker benefits from 4 different selectable power-saving standby modes, which allow it to operate up to 90 days in live tracking mode.
Ready To Use Out The Box

PAY AS YOU GO TRACKING Our system works in "Pay as you go" basis, which means you do not have to commit to taking out contracts or direct debits. Simply Top-up and start tracking! INSTANT NOTIFICATIONS GPSLive can be set to notify you by an SMS, Instant APP Notification or an Email whenever a predefined event occurs. The smartphone notifications are nearly instant and free of charge. ROUTE HISTORY Our web-based Cloud software can be accessed from any PC, Laptop, Smartphone or Tablet with an internet connection. View completed trips, routes and part locations.

GEO FENCE ZONES GPSLive software allows you to create geo zones that can be drawn on the map around specific locations. Geofence zones are virtual barriers that can be used to set up an alert that will trigger every time your vehicle enters or leaves the area. You can set up a geofence zone around your house or your workplace. Geo zone alert will instantly notify you with a push notification, SMS or email. Geo-fence zones can act as an early warning system in case of emergencies and help businesses to record time spent on and off work sites. FLEET MANAGEMENT SYSTEM GPS live tracking software provides users with extensive information about their vehicles, such as; real-time location and address of the vehicle, previous route history for up to 1 year, alerts & notifications, geo-fence zones, business mileage logging, dashboards and reports. Vehicle tracking systems can be tailored to fit Motorcycles, cars, vans and lorries. Whether you have 10 or 1000 vehicles, GPSLive can become an irreplaceable tool and allow individuals and fleet managers to make the necessary adjustments to improve their fleet operations and profitability. REAL-TIME VEHICLE TRACKING The primary role of GPS trackers is to provide real-time geolocation of tracked vehicles and objects. Vehicle trackers allow you to locate your vehicles and mobile assets quickly on the map. You will be able to monitor the movements of your vehicles in real-time while they are en route for a delivery or check on your family members when they are driving through town. With the ability to locate a vehicle on-demand, managers and family members can send help in matters of emergency depending on the severity of the situation.

The 104-Pro is a fantastic choice for anyone who needs a GPS tracker with a long battery life in a compact casing. Its powerful flat plate magnet is an ideal solution for covert use. The full-featured 104-Pro 4G GPS tracking device can send position updates from as little as every 30 seconds. It also benefits from four different selectable power-saving sleep modes. Using these advanced settings, you can get up to 90 days of battery life off one charge. The 104-Pro 4G uses a whopping 10000mAh or 20000mAh battery, built for long-term tracking. Once it's placed in a vehicle, the user only needs a mobile phone, tablet or PC to check its location. 104-PRO 4G is supplied with our UK-based online live tracking server GPSLive. GPSLive is very user-friendly, and most of its features are customisable by users, including email alerts, alarms such as speeding, geo-fence zones and out-of-hours use.

104 Pro 4G Plus Spytrack Nano Live Tracking ✓ ✓ History Playback ✓ ✓ Free Instant Alerts ✓ ✓ Plug & Play ✓ ✓ Portable ✓ ✓ Battery Up to 90 days of tracking on one charge Up to 10 days of tracking on one charge

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy and quick to set up and accurate
reviews.reviewText: I decided to test out this GPS and was pleasantly surprised by its performance. Although it required some initial trial and error during setup, I eventually got it working perfectly. I'm really happy with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, accurate little unit.
reviews.reviewText: The reason I did not award 5 stars to this product is because the software is a little clunky to set up, but once you have it going it's easy to look and see where your vehicle is on a map. It seems like it was designed for more of a fleet, rather than a household, but I guess that's beside the point as it still works for my purposes. I have a classic car stored somewhere that is secure, but of course it's always subject to theft, so I feel confident with the GPS tracker hidden inside of it, ready to alert me of any movement. It actually has relieved some stress from my life as something I don't have to continue to worry about. It's built tough, strong magnets let me hide it easily where I wanted to. Will update if the battery performance lets me down, or the car is stolen without a movement alert haha.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works exactly as described, easy to install and set up. The app is easy to use, definitely recommended
